title: Comcast Issues
body:
Hi, I have already contacted Riot Support about this issue. I am posting to see if anyone else is struggling with Comcast. In game ping consistently jumps from 40ms to 400ms. It is the same old story: streaming, web browsing, and literally everything else works perfectly fine.... EXCEPT League of Legends. It just seems so strange. Feel free to comment. Like I said I was just curious if I was the only one experiencing problems with Comcast in the past week.

Cheers,
Always Persist

replies.body: Yeah man, Comcast is the worst sometimes. Some days it works perfectly fine, other days it just goes out for no reason for like 30 seconds. Its very annoying.

Hi,

I think Riot and Comcast have some kind of feud going on where Comcast throttles League users.... but that is just me being a crazy conspiracy theorist!
Thank you for your comment Snarpon.

Cheers,
Always Persist

Hey, if you have a ticket open already then our tech team should be able to help you our directly!  We can also get a solid overview of where these hiccups are occurring through a traceroute.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a route to the NA game server: 104.160.131.1

Run it for about 5 minutes, remove the IP on the first two rows, and let me know what you find.
